Great Job, and a great way to get independent music out there!! I applaud both Stockholm and Pirate Bay! Keep up the good work, both of you. The money should go directly to the musicians, pure and simple. This is the future.

Thank you both, the Pirate Bay and Stockholm, for sharing this with us, I really enjoyed the album. You guys should do everything you can to NOT get signed, follow the Nine Inch Nails/Radiohead model and sell your own shit. The record industry are the real thieves who rob artists of their souls and their profits. Do it yourselves, guys, you're good enough to pull it off!
Nice! :D Keep up the good work! ;)

guys - 1st - thanks for the free DL. Awesome of you.

2nd - You are pretty close to getting my vote. but most of this CD is just not my taste. It's Whiny 80's attempted revival that lacks substance. It's perfectly produced and sounds great, but most of the tracks sound like most of the crap that is already out there and it bores the shit out of me.

Now, Interpol did it almost perfect with their "Bright Lights" CD. The Ponys have a harder edge, but they got it right. Catherine Wheel - listen to their CD 'Ferment'. American Analog Set's 'Know By Heart' is one of the best revivalist CDs EVER created. The National's 'Boxer' CD, The Go-betweens, Even the Magnetic Fields. check out Yo La Tengo's 'I Can Hear the Heart Beating as One'. Most of these bands have a stand out sound and I think you need to dig a little deeper to find yours.

'Don't Stop Now' is a great song, but I just got bored with the rest of it...

Anyways, sorry for the critic and thanks for the DL!
Awesome!
